content: Define the module named TopModule with a 3-bit input port 'a' and a 16-bit output port 'q'.
source:
I would like you to implement a module named TopModule with the following interface. All input and output ports are one bit unless otherwise specified.

 - input  a ( 3 bits)
 - output q (16 bits)

content: Implement the combinational logic to map the 3-bit input 'a' to the corresponding 16-bit output 'q'. Use the provided waveform to determine the mapping: when 'a' is 0, 'q' is 1232; when 'a' is 1, 'q' is aee0; when 'a' is 2, 'q' is 27d4; when 'a' is 3, 'q' is 5a0e; when 'a' is 4, 'q' is 2066; when 'a' is 5, 'q' is 64ce; when 'a' is 6, 'q' is c526; when 'a' is 7, 'q' is 2f19.
source:
The module should implement a combinational circuit. Read the simulation waveforms to determine what the circuit does, then implement it.

  time  a     q
  0ns   x     x
  5ns   x     x
  10ns  x     x
  15ns  0  1232
  20ns  1  aee0
  25ns  2  27d4
  30ns  3  5a0e
  35ns  4  2066
  40ns  5  64ce
  45ns  6  c526
  50ns  7  2f19
  55ns  0  1232
  60ns  1  aee0
  65ns  2  27d4
  70ns  4  2066
  75ns  1  aee0
  80ns  1  aee0
  85ns  3  5a0e
  90ns  5  64ce
